Name: Basic Revival Inhaler
AttributesDescription: Used to immediately revive and heal a selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.
ObtainedShowDescription: Used to immediately revive and heal a selected downed Resonator for 100 HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
